meanings.definition: A person who operates a flying machine.
meanings.sent1: The flyman piloted the airplane with ease.
meanings.sent2: The flyman guided the helicopter through the clouds.
meanings.sent3: The flyman joked that he could fly to the moon in his plane.
meanings.sent4: Watching the flyman control the glider was like witnessing poetry in motion.
meanings.sent5: The young boy was mesmerized by the flyman's ability to soar above the treetops.

meanings.definition: A man who is skilled at flying.
meanings.sent1: The experienced flyman performed daring stunts in the airshow.
meanings.sent2: The talented flyman landed the hot air balloon smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The flyman's precision in flying made him the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: His reputation as a skilled flyman spread far and wide.
meanings.sent5: The flyman's expertise in aviation was unmatched by anyone in the region.

meanings.definition: A man who is stylish or fashionable.
meanings.sent1: The flyman strutted down the runway in his trendy outfit.
meanings.sent2: All eyes turned to the flyman as he entered the party in his designer suit.
meanings.sent3: The flyman's fashion sense was so sharp that he could make a paper bag look good.
meanings.sent4: He carried himself like a true flyman, exuding confidence and charm.
meanings.sent5: The flyman's impeccable style made him a role model for many young men in the city.

meanings.definition: A man who is quick or agile.
meanings.sent1: The flyman darted through the crowd to catch the runaway kite.
meanings.sent2: With lightning speed, the flyman leaped over the hurdles in the race.
meanings.sent3: The flyman's agility on the dance floor impressed everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: His reflexes were so sharp that he was nicknamed the flyman by his friends.
meanings.sent5: The flyman's nimbleness allowed him to avoid obstacles effortlessly during the obstacle course.
